Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Chicago
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Milwaukee, Chicago and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Milwaukee, Chicago and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Morse
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Morse due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Morse due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
